messages.subject: Being with our kids
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the link to the unscooling.com conversation about being with our kids. It took me three days to work through it. But so worth it. I feel revitalized
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the link to the unscooling.com conversation about
being with our kids. It took me three days to work through it. But
so worth it. I feel revitalized in my commitment to my kids.

Also, I just rec'd in the mail a copy of Whole Child, Whole Parent
and have already read the first two chapters. Great book!

Thanks for all the input and support. My time on list is limited by
my online teaching right now, but I just wanted to pop in and say
hi and thanks! You gals are a treasure trove of great dialog and
resources.

Julie B
